references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper introduces CLIP, a foundational vision-language model that is extensively used and adapted in this work.

references.paper_title: Test-time prompt tuning for zero-shot generalization in vision-language models
references.reason: This paper proposes Test-Time Prompt Tuning (TPT), a key method this paper builds upon and improves.

references.paper_title: Efficient test-time adaptation of vision-language models
references.reason: This paper introduces Training-Free Dynamic Adapter (TDA), a direct competitor to the proposed method in this paper.
This paper introduces the AdamW optimizer used for training the proposed method.
This paper introduces t-SNE, a dimensionality reduction technique used for visualization in this paper.
